tr.td: merge the 1_1_4dev developers branch back into the main trunk
Make the new navigation system to the default system
Remove * imports so checkstyle will make less error
Clean up tags to write out clean XHTML
For the disabled: Write name attribute to each generated table cell with tablename_columnname_rownum
Kepp textField empty when numeric field in database is null

make JasperReport directories configurable Is it possible to have the configuration of StartReportServlet done by user the way it's done for ConfigServlet instead of limiting reports to be placed in WEB-INF/custom/reports, or WEB-INF/reports? I have used JasperReports for some time and have placed report definitions in sub-directories of WEB- INF/templates/reports. I would like to keep this configuration.
Making the fieldValues.remove("something_I_dont_want_updated") work? It gets ignored now.

Make it possible to have the configurations as attributes in the <db:dateField> tag instead of putting them in web.xml. Some thing like: <db:dateField fieldName="birthdate" useJsCalendar="true" jsCalendarDateFormat="yyyy-mm-dd" jsCalendarImageHeight="16" jsCalendarImageWidth="16" jsCalendarImageSrc="<%=imageFiles%>" /> If the attributes are not given then the tag takes the default values (current implementation).
Use information of config file in select/radio/searchcombo tags so that xml tables could be used. Best would be to create a new tag.
remove depency from cos.jar. This jar could not be used for commercial applications without "problems"
